DOC.brief_summary: A multicentre , randomise , open label study out-patients major depression fail respond adequately antidepressant treatment current episode depression . The study compare outcomes associate two method switch current antidepressant duloxetine
DOC.criteria: Male female outpatient least 18 year age , meet criterion Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) Currently non partiallyresponsive SSRI antidepressant least 5 week treatment Exclusion Criteria include : Current primary Axis I disorder MDD Previous diagnosis bipolar disorder , schizophrenia , psychotic disorder Patients judge serious suicidal risk . Serious medical illness
